name: CUBE Runner (itch) (Polygonya)
description:
Control the cube precisely through the level.

Dodge the objects and traps and collect as many coins as you can. Use the coins to buy upgrades for your next run or unlock new levels.

Will you survive longer than your friends? write your record in the comments.

------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

Move cube forward: W / up arrow key

Move cube backwards: S / down arrow key

Move cube to the right: D / right arrow key

Move cube to the left: A / Arrow key to the left

Jump: Spacebar

Activate SlowMo: Shift

------------------------------------------------------------------

you can also download the game for free from the Google Playstore.

Thanks for your support!
